review: I bought this as an upgrade from my Sony streaming player. It has a lot of great new and improved features. l love it!  The only thing I didn't like was that you can't turn it off. You can unplug it, but that's it. It's always on. Like there's no on/off switch. It's weird. If you don't use it, then it just puts up a screen saver of some  BEAUTIFUL landscapes. And it knows who you are when you plug it in. That was a little creepy, but I guess that's technology for ya! Of course my husband thinks it's watching us with it's white eye all lit up. LOL! But, overall, it is definitely an improvement from the old. I recommend it!

The only reason why I did not give Amazon fire TV a five star rating is...Make it to where I can watch live basketball, baseball and other popular live shows with a Pay per view system.  When you incorporate a way to do this(that's cheaper than cable mind you) I will be ecstatic. Please and thank you.
